params.text:
• Determining who will manage/store/secure the preservation master files
  • Determining who will manage/store/secure the print and analog records
  • A discussion of feasibility of institutional partnerships for the safe storage of the digitised files (for example: the research arm of the Cree Board of Health and Social Services of James Bay)
  • The finalisation of a Memorandum of Understanding regarding the data stewardship (including who will have the right to provide access for future research or other initiatives) and the management of intellectual property rights

panels.title: Further data management and preservation planning will include:
